meanings.sent1: I enjoy the tanginesses of the lemonade.
meanings.sent2: The salad dressing had a pleasant tanginesses.
meanings.sent3: The tanginesses of the salsa made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a tanginesses that left a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The tanginesses of the pickles lingered on my tongue.

meanings.definition: The state of having a sharp, pungent taste.
meanings.sent1: The tanginesses of the cheese caught me by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The curry's tanginesses added depth to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The tanginesses of the hot sauce made my eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The tanginesses of the vinegar cut through the richness of the dish.
meanings.sent5: The tanginesses of the mustard woke up my taste buds.
